description.overview: d3akash.cloud is a Decentralized Physical Infrastrucutre Provider (DePIN) for the decentralized future of the internet. Stake with us and be part ot the revolution.
description.team: d3akash.cloud was created by a technology enthusiast and long-time systemsengineer who focuses on providing the highest quality infrastructure and services for the decentralized web. We believe in a decentralized world where every being is a part of the whole and we provide the basic infrastructures for that future.
